title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
description:
Job Summary:
 



 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior AI Engineer to play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and deploying the core artificial intelligence and machine learning capabilities of the Nexus platform. You will be responsible for building the AI models and algorithms that serve as the platform's brain, enabling intelligent opportunity discovery, supply chain optimization, and risk\-aware decision support. This is a unique opportunity to shape an innovative AI product from the ground up and solve complex, high\-impact problems in the industrial sector.
 



 Key Responsibilities:
 



 AI Model Development \& Implementation: Design, develop, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to power core platform functionalities, including:
 



 Opportunity \& Collaboration Matching: Develop recommendation engines and graph\-based models to identify and score collaboration opportunities between producers, service providers, and communities (e.g., matching a mine's transportation needs with a nearby logistics provider's capacity).
 



 Resource Optimization \& Forecasting: Build predictive models to forecast supply/demand imbalances, optimize resource allocation (e.g., equipment sharing, procurement), and identify potential supply chain efficiencies.
 



 Risk \& Threat Intelligence: Implement NLP and time\-series models to analyze public and proprietary data for early detection of socio\-political, economic, or environmental risks that could impact projects and supply chains.
 



 Persona \& Behavior Modeling: Create clustering and classification models to develop rich "personas" of platform participants (organizations, communities) based on their operational data, stated needs, and platform behavior to personalize insights.
 



 Intelligent Commerce \& RFP Analysis: Leverage NLP and LLMs to analyze and classify incoming RFPs, automate the matching of RFPs to qualified service providers, and extract key commercial terms and requirements.
 



 Data Engineering \& Pipelines: Collaborate closely with Data Engineers to design and implement robust data pipelines for collecting, processing, and preparing diverse data streams (including geospatial, operational, and commercial data) for AI model training and real\-time inference.
 



 Algorithm Optimization \& Evaluation: Continuously evaluate, iterate, and improve the performance, scalability, and accuracy of AI models and algorithms.
 



 Research \& Innovation: Stay at the forefront of advancements in AI/ML, NLP, predictive analytics, and related fields—particularly in areas relevant to industrial optimization, graph neural networks, and geospatial AI—and proactively prototype new capabilities.
 



 Collaboration: Work in close partnership with product managers, solution architects, and software engineers to deeply understand requirements, define innovative AI solutions, and seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into the broader platform architecture.
 



 Deployment \& MLOps: Actively contribute to the MLOps strategy for deploying, monitoring, versioning, and maintaining AI models in a scalable and reliable production environment on AWS.
 



 Required Qualifications:
 



 Master’s or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, or a related quantitative field.
 



**5\+ years of hands\-on experience in designing and implementing machine learning models and AI solutions in a production environment.** 




 Strong proficiency in Python and common AI/ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit\-learn).
 



 Proven experience with Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques and libraries (e.g., spaCy, NLTK, Hugging Face Transformers).
 



 Experience with LLMs and generative AI, particularly for text classification and information extraction.
 



 Solid understanding of predictive modeling, classification, clustering, and recommendation algorithms.
 



 Familiarity with MLOps principles and tools for model deployment and monitoring in a cloud environment (AWS preferred).
 



 Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex, ambiguous problems.
 



 Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
 



 Preferred Qualifications:
 



 Experience developing AI solutions for industrial applications, such as supply chain management, logistics, manufacturing, or natural resources.
 



 Experience with graph databases (e.g., Neo4j) and graph neural networks (GNNs).
 



 Familiarity with geospatial data and relevant libraries/tools (e.g., GeoPandas, PostGIS).
 



 Experience with time\-series forecasting models.
 



 Experience with cloud platforms (specifically AWS) and their AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker).
 



 Knowledge of database technologies (SQL, NoSQL).
 



 Why Join us?
 



 Be a foundational member of an innovative AI company with a clear vision and significant market opportunity in the industrial sector.
 



 Work on challenging and impactful problems at the intersection of AI and industrial optimization.
 



 Collaborate with a passionate and experienced team dedicated to building a transformative product for Canada's core industries.
 



 Opportunity for significant growth and leadership as the company scales.
 



 Competitive salary, equity, and benefits package.
 



 How to Apply:
 



 If you're a passionate and talented ai engineer , we'd love to hear from you so PLz apply through the WhatsApp link https://wa.me/\+201062033294?text\=

title: Senior AI Engineer (Computer Vision)
location: El Sheikh Zaid, Al Jizah, Egypt
description:
**Job description** 




 As a Senior AI Engineer with a focus on computer vision, you will be a key contributor to our research and development efforts. Your primary responsibility will be to lead the design, development, and deployment of advanced computer vision algorithms and models. You will work closely with cross\-functional teams to deliver industry\-leading AI solutions that make a significant impact on our products and services. This role offers an exciting opportunity to showcase your expertise in computer vision and contribute to the advancement of AI technologies.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Computer Vision Algorithm Development: Lead the research, design, and implementation of state\-of\-the\-art computer vision algorithms, including but not limited to image recognition, object detection, image segmentation, and pose estimation.
* Model Training and Optimization: Utilize your deep learning expertise to train, fine\-tune, and optimize computer vision models using popular deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
* Data Preprocessing and Augmentation: Work with large\-scale datasets, applying data preprocessing and augmentation techniques to ensure high\-quality inputs for computer vision tasks.
* Performance Evaluation: Evaluate and benchmark the performance of computer vision models, utilizing appropriate metrics and methodologies to ensure accuracy and efficiency.
* Research and Innovation: Stay up\-to\-date with the latest research papers and advancements in computer vision. Apply cutting\-edge techniques to solve complex AI challenges.
* Cross\-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with software engineers, data scientists, and product managers to integrate computer vision capabilities into our products and deliver end\-to\-end AI solutions.
* Prototyping and Proof of Concept: Rapidly create prototypes to demonstrate the feasibility and potential impact of computer vision solutions in real\-world scenarios.
* Technical Leadership: Mentor and support junior AI engineers, providing technical guidance and expertise to facilitate their professional growth.
* Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of algorithms, models, and development processes to support knowledge sharing and future research.



  





  





**Qualifications:** 




  




* Education: Master's or bachelor in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field with a focus on computer vision and deep learning. Equivalent industry experience will also be considered.
* Experience: \[3\+] years of hands\-on experience in computer vision research and development, with a track record of successfully delivering complex computer vision projects.
* Technical Skills: Strong programming skills in languages such as Python and proficiency in popular deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). Familiarity with GPU computing for accelerated model training is a plus.
* Computer Vision Expertise: Deep knowledge and practical experience in various computer vision tasks and techniques, including CNNs, R\-CNNs, GANs, and other state\-of\-the\-art models.
* Research Publications: A history of publishing research papers in top\-tier conferences or journals related to computer vision and AI is a significant advantage.
* Problem\-Solving: Exceptional analytical and problem\-solving skills, with a demonstrated ability to innovate and develop novel solutions to complex computer vision challenges.
* Collaboration and Communication: Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to work effectively within cross\-functional teams and present complex technical concepts to non\-technical stakeholders.
* Passion for AI: A genuine passion for artificial intelligence, computer vision, and emerging technologies, along with a desire to contribute to the field and push the boundaries of AI applications.

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer - Generative AI
company: Flipped.ai - Transforming Talent Acquisition with AI
description:
**About You**
 You're a highly motivated, hands\-on engineer with a deep conviction in AI's potential to transform industries. Your enthusiasm for technology is matched by your energy and curiosity. Thriving in unstructured startup environments, you possess a strong work ethic and a high degree of autonomy. Your approach is both creative and strategic, eagerly tackling challenges and leveraging AI to drive industry advancements.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We seek an exceptional AI engineer with a robust background in emerging technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT, LLAMA, BERT, and transformer\-based architectures. Your role will involve fine\-tuning and optimizing these models for our AI wealth technology platform, ensuring they seamlessly integrate with our systems to enhance the user experience. This position demands a blend of technical prowess, innovative thinking, and leadership, ideal for someone passionate about applying AI within consumer fintech.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and execute a comprehensive AI roadmap that aligns with our strategic business goals.
* Lead the technical design, development, testing, deployment, documentation, and maintenance of end\-to\-end AI features.
* Innovate in data management, strategically using embeddings to improve the relevancy of vector search.
* Collaborate with marketing, product, and business teams to integrate AI technologies across applications.
* Stay abreast of the latest AI trends, including advanced prompting techniques, AI agent construction, and in\-context learning workflows.
* Contribute groundbreaking ideas for future AI initiatives and technology integration.
* Foster a culture of technical excellence, agility, and innovation within the team, contributing to strategic planning and the overall technological direction of the company.


**Qualifications**
* Ph.D. in computer science, AI/ML, or related fields, with a focus on deep learning, neural networks, and generative AI.
* At least 2\-7 years of experience in AI/ML, with expertise in developing, fine\-tuning, and optimizing large language models and transformer\-based architectures.
* Profound knowledge of deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and in\-context learning workflows, including data preprocessing, embedding, prompt construction, and execution.
* Demonstrated experience with API integration and the development of AI agents, showcasing the ability to test and design AI performance and reliability measures.
* Strong programming skills in Python, JavaScript, or similar languages, with a thorough understanding of software engineering best practices.
* Exceptional communication skills, capable of conveying complex AI concepts to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders.

title: AI Engineer
description:
**Who are we:** 




 Turbostart is not just a startup fund and accelerator — we are a catalyst for builders and a powerhouse of innovation. Our mission is to propel early\-stage startups into the future by providing unparalleled support in technology, marketing, strategy, and beyond. We're in the business of building tomorrow's leaders — today. After 5 years and 5 funds, we have supported over 50 startups spanning sectors, stages, and geographies — and this is just the beginning!
 



 Turbostart spans India, the Middle East, the US, and Singapore — giving you the opportunity to gain exposure and see the impact of your work ripple across regions. Turbostart has also launched 5 Centers of Excellence across Tech, Marketing, Sales, UI/UX, and Investment Banking to support the growth of our startup network.
 



 Know more about us:
 
 https://turbostart.co
 




  





**Turbostart Technology Development Centre (T2C)** 
 is a leading Center of Excellence within the Turbostart ecosystem. T2C plays a pivotal role by providing cutting\-edge technology solutions and expertise to our portfolio companies and by building new\-age software products from the ground up. Know more about us:
 
 https://tsquaredc.com
 




  





**What we are looking for:** 




**Role: AI Engineer** 




 We are looking for a dynamic and skilled AI Engineer with 2\+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying machine learning solutions. You’ll work across data\-rich problem statements, collaborating closely with product and engineering teams to build intelligent systems that scale.
 



**Location:** 
 Kolkata, West Bengal, India
 



**Experience Required:** 
 2–4 years of hands\-on experience in AI/ML engineering or applied data science.
 



  





**What you’ll do:** 



* Design and implement cutting\-edge machine learning and deep learning models for various use cases, with a strong focus on conversational AI (voice agents, chatbots), natural language understanding and generation, and generative media (images, video).
* Work with large datasets to preprocess, clean, and extract insights, including diverse modalities such as audio, visual, and textual data for advanced AI applications.
* Build and maintain robust data pipelines and model\-serving frameworks, ensuring scalable and real\-time deployment for conversational agents and high\-throughput generative services.
* Collaborate with product managers and developers to integrate sophisticated ML models into scalable systems, such as voice platforms, intelligent chatbot frameworks, and content creation pipelines.
* Optimize model performance through hyperparameter tuning and continuous retraining, applying domain\-specific evaluation metrics for conversational fluency, image realism, video quality, and natural language understanding.
* Conduct in\-depth research on new AI technologies and assess their feasibility for implementation, with a particular emphasis on state\-of\-the\-art Large Language Models (LLMs), multimodal AI, speech synthesis, generative adversarial networks (GANs), and diffusion models.
* Ensure model explainability, accuracy, and fairness in deployment environments, paying close attention to potential biases in generative content, conversational interactions, and ethical AI principles.
* Write clean, reusable code and maintain proper documentation of experiments and model versions, especially for iterative development in generative AI and complex conversational flows



  





**Our ideal candidate:** 



* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
* Proficiency in Python and ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit\-learn.
* Extensive experience with model development, training, validation, and deployment in production environments.
* Familiarity with REST APIs and integrating ML models with web services or applications.
* Strong understanding and hands\-on experience with generative AI models (GANs, VAEs, Diffusion Models).
* Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs), including fine\-tuning, prompt engineering, and Retrieval\-Augmented Generation (RAG).
* Proficiency in Natural Language Processing (NLP), including NLU, NLG, intent recognition, entity extraction, and dialogue management.
* Hands\-on experience with speech technologies such as Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) and Text\-to\-Speech (TTS).
* Knowledge of computer vision techniques like image/video processing, object detection, and segmentation, especially for generative media.
* Familiarity with tools and APIs for conversational and generative AI (e.g., Vapi, Retell, Ultravox, 11 Labs).
* Experience working with LLM/multimodal APIs such as OpenAI (GPT, DALL\-E, Whisper), Claude API, and Gemini API.
* Exposure to video generation tools like Veo2 or similar platforms.
* Experience using model tracking and visualization tools like Jupyter, MLflow, or TensorBoard.
* Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and containerization tools like Docker.
* Understanding of key AI performance metrics including F1\-score, AUC\-ROC, IS, FID, BLEU, ROUGE, WER, and others relevant to different model types.
* Strong problem\-solving and communication skills.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\-paced, agile environment.



  





**Why join us** 



* Work on cutting\-edge projects with startups across multiple industries.
* Be at the forefront of building next\-gen tech products in emerging sectors.
* Work in a high\-autonomy environment that values speed, experimentation, and innovation.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional experts across engineering, design, product, and strategy.

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
location: Kolkata metropolitan area, West Bengal, India
description:
**Position Overview:** 




 We are seeking a talented and motivated AI Engineer with a strong focus on Computer Vision to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a passion for solving complex problems in the field of machine learning and computer vision, as well as the technical expertise required to build and deploy AI solutions. 
 



 This role is perfect for individuals with 1\-4 years of relevant experience, strong programming skills in Python, and a solid understanding of computer vision frameworks and libraries.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




 \- Design, develop, and deploy computer vision models to solve real\-world problems.
 



 \- Implement machine learning algorithms for image processing, object detection, segmentation, and recognition tasks.
 



 \- Optimize and fine\-tune models using frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow.
 



 \- Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver efficient AI\-driven solutions.
 



 \- Analyze large\-scale datasets to derive meaningful insights and improve model performance.
 



 \- Create and maintain robust, scalable code for production\-level AI systems.
 



 \- Research and stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in computer vision and AI.
 



  





**Required Skills and Qualifications:** 




 \- Educational Background: Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, or a related field.
 



 \- Experience: 1\-4 years of hands\-on experience in computer vision and machine learning.
 



 \- Programming Skills: Proficient in Python, with a strong understanding of object\-oriented programming and scripting.
 



 \- Frameworks: Expertise in using PyTorch and TensorFlow for model development and training.
 



 \- Libraries: Proficient in popular Python libraries such as:
 



  \- OpenCV\-python for computer vision tasks.
 



  \- Pillow for image processing.
 



  \- scikit\-learn for machine learning and data preprocessing.
 



 \- Mathematics: Strong foundation in mathematical concepts related to machine learning and computer vision, including:
 



  \- Linear algebra
 



  \- Probability and statistics
 



  \- Calculus
 



 \- Computer Vision Algorithms: Practical experience in implementing and working with algorithms like:
 



  \- Object detection
 



  \- Image classification
 



  \- Object segmentation
 



  \- Activity recognition (optional but preferred)
 



  \- Keypoint detection (optional but preferred)
 



 \- Familiarity with image annotation tools and dataset preparation techniques.
 



 \- Experience in version control systems like Git.
 



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 




 \- Knowledge of deploying models on edge devices or cloud platforms.
 



 \- Familiarity with deep learning architectures like CNNs, RNNs, or GANs.
 



 \- Experience with optimization techniques for model inference speed and accuracy.
 



 \- Contributions to open\-source projects in computer vision or machine learning.
 



  





  





 If you are passionate about applying AI to solve challenging computer vision problems and have the skills required to excel in this role, we encourage you to apply. Join us in building the next generation of intelligent systems!

description:
**Company Description** 




 Steora provides business and technology outsourcing solutions tailored to small and mid\-level markets globally, ensuring each client receives the specific support they require. Our flexible approach meets unique business needs, offering technical support, functional assistance, and comprehensive CRM solutions. The dedicated team at Steora offers end\-to\-end support, from technical troubleshooting to business process improvements and CRM implementation. By optimizing customer interactions and improving business intelligence, we help clients focus on core activities and drive growth. Steora strives to be a trusted partner with scalable solutions that evolve with your business.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\-time on\-site role (hybrid) for a Generative AI Engineer located in the Kolkata metropolitan area. The Generative AI Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing generative AI models and algorithms. Daily tasks include conducting research, experimenting with new techniques, and collaborating with team members to enhance AI capabilities. The role involves analyzing data, solving complex problems, and integrating AI solutions into existing systems to improve functionality and performance.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Experience in designing and implementing generative AI models and algorithms
* Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, or JavaScript
* Strong problem\-solving skills and ability to conduct independent research
* Knowledge of machine learning frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras

title: AI Engineer
description:
Camgian is looking to expand its development organization with the addition of an AI Engineer to join our team. We are focused on applying state\-of\-the\-art Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, and Deep Learning technologies to advance decision support products in the government and commercial markets. This is a hands\-on technical position that involves the development, training, and validation of AI, ML, CV \& DL based algorithms and models. Teamwork, flexibility, and willingness to continuously learn new concepts \& technologies are critical requirements for this position.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, statistics, or mathematics
* Proficiency in Python
* Experience with AI, ML concepts and techniques through professional and/or academic projects
* 0 \- 5 years professional experience
* United States Citizenship


**Desired Skills**
* Master’s degree in a computer science related discipline
* Foundational knowledge in AI, ML, and DL with a strong mathematical background
* Strong programming skills
* Experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit\-learn and/or OpenCV
* Experience with tools such as NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, MATLAB
* Creative problem solving ability
* Understanding of Agile development methodology
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills


 Exceptional work ethic, willingness to learn, tenacity not to quit, aptitude to surpass, and strong desire to work in a fast\-paced environment are necessary for success. Collaboration and cross pollination with other teams will be frequent; thus communication, openness, and willingness to share both success and failure is a must. We are a team\-centric organization, there are no individuals, we win and lose together.
   

  

 Camgian offers a competitive salary, fun work environment, fringe benefits, and an equity opportunity.
   

  

**Camgian Culture and Core Value Traits**
* Ability to work as part of a team while maintaining independent thinking
* Self\-driven and self\-starter in addition to excellent communication skills
* Thinking outside the box and an aptitude for innovation and problem solving
* Always willing to explore the other side of fear, be challenged and to crave cutting edge technologies

title: AI Engineer - Machine Learning 2 (Robotics)
description:
**Job Description**
 The primary consideration for this position is a preference for candidates with experience in robotics or reinforcement learning, rather than those specializing in natural language models or computer vision.
   

  

 Our team seeks a Machine Learning Engineer to advance the development and improvement of our software foundation and tools vital for training state\-of\-the\-art AI models. Your role will be centered on creating strong, scalable, and efficient training infrastructures and frameworks facilitating the full spectrum of the machine learning process, from handling data to deploying models. In collaboration with researchers and software engineers, you'll ensure that training systems are smoothly integrated and functioning, expanding the limits of AI's capabilities, especially in practical robotics scenarios. Additionally, you will investigate innovative methods to effectively utilize diverse datasets within our training framework.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Create and uphold efficient, scalable, and distributed training systems—including data preprocessing, training orchestration, and model assessment—for training large\-scale AI models.
* Enhance the efficiency of training procedures to improve performance and use of resources, while maintaining scalability and dependability.
* Collaborate with researchers to create training and evaluation pipelines for state\-of\-the\-art algorithms.
* Develop and design benchmarks for evaluating ML models.
* Perform training and and fine\-tuning of foundation models for robotic applications .
* Monitor and analyze pipelines, identifying bottlenecks and proposing solutions to improve efficiency and performance.
* Ensure the robustness and reliability of the training infrastructure, including automated testing and continuous integration.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* BS, MS or higher degree in Computer Science, Robotics, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* Proficiency in Python, C\+\+, or similar and at least one deep learning library such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, etc.
* Strong background in distributed computing, parallel processing techniques, handling large\-scale datasets and data preprocessing.
* Deep understanding of state\-of\-the\-art machine learning techniques and models.
* Experience with cloud\-based training environments (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
* Experience in developing and maintaining software tooling and infrastructure for machine learning.
* Deep understanding and practical experience with software engineering principles, including algorithms, data structures, and system design.
* Experience with continuous integration and automated testing frameworks.


**Candidate Requirements**
* Years of Experience Required: 2\-5 (or 5\+ if possible) overall years of experience in the field.
* Degrees or certifications required: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related filed is required to be eligible for this role.
* Best vs. Average: The ideal resume would contain position as a master's degree student where they worked on robots, reinforcement learning, action models. If has a doctorate or partial doctorate is a plus.
* Performance Indicators: Performance will be assessed based on meeting deadlines and quality of work.


**Top 3 Hard Skills Required \+ Years of Experience**
* Minimum 2\+ years experience with Linux
* Minimum 2\+years experience with Python
* Minimum 2\+years experience with Configuration management.


**In addition:**
 2\+ ROS/ROS2
   

  

 2\+ TensorFlow
   

  

 2\+ Any sort of machine learning packages.

title: GEN AI Engineer
description:
The
 **GEN AI Engineer** 
 is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining data pipelines to extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from multiple sources into a centralized data warehouse. This role collaborates closely with data analysts and business stakeholders to deliver actionable insights that enhance operational efficiency and improve customer satisfaction.
 



  





 This is a contract role until 6/2026 with possibility to become temp to hire based on performance.
 



 Fully remote \- must be able to work in Eastern Standard Time.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




**Data Engineering** 



* Design and develop robust data pipelines using modern tools and technologies.
* Extract data from diverse systems (CRM, call center, etc.), transform it into standardized formats, and ensure high data quality and consistency.
* Load data into data warehouses and data lakes for analysis and reporting.



**Data Modeling** 



* Develop data models aligned with business domains to support reporting and analytics.
* Design and implement dimensional and analytical data models.



**Data Integration** 



* Integrate data from various sources, resolving inconsistencies and ensuring data integrity.
* Develop and maintain automated ETL processes for data ingestion and transformation.



**Data Quality** 



* Monitor and implement checks to ensure data accuracy, completeness, and reliability.
* Identify and resolve data quality issues proactively.



**Performance Optimization** 



* Optimize pipelines and queries for efficient data processing and timely delivery.
* Continuously seek and implement performance improvements.



**Collaboration** 



* Partner with data analysts, business analysts, and other stakeholders to translate business needs into technical solutions.
* Support data science teams in advanced analytics and machine learning initiatives.



  





**Qualifications** 



* **Education:** 
 Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* **Experience:**

**Technical Skills**

* Foundational understanding of

 **data governance** 
 ,

 ,

 ,
 **privacy** 
 , and

 in AI initiatives.

* Strong critical thinking, analytical, and problem\-solving skills.
* Ability to work cross\-functionally in a fast\-paced, remote team environment.

title: Senior AI Engineer
description:
**Description**
**Job Title\-** 
 Senior AI Engineer
   

  

**Department\-** 
 IT
   

  

**Reports to\-** 
 VP Software Development
   

  

**Location\-** 
 Remote
   

  

**Who We Are\-**
 Elevate Aviation Group, established in 2003, provides air transportation, travel consultancy, aircraft acquisitions and aircraft management services to some of the most recognized names in business, sports, entertainment, government, and higher education. Elevate Aviation Group’s wholly owned subsidiaries, Private Jet Services, Elevate Jet, and Elevate MRO share a mission to provide aircraft owners and flyers unsurpassed service, safety, and counsel. Whether clients require charter flights, large group travel, aircraft management services, aircraft maintenance or aircraft acquisition services, Elevate Aviation Group delivers highly personalized solutions to meet each client’s unique needs 24 hours a day, 365 days of the year to any destination.
   

  

**Summary Of Position\-**
 We are seeking a highly skilled Senior AI Engineer to develop and implement AI and machine learning solutions using a combination of external and proprietary data sources. This role will leverage AWS tools and services to build scalable, secure, and efficient data\-driven systems that support business decision\-making, optimize operations, and foster innovation across the organization.
   

  

**Essential Duties \& Responsibilities\-**
* Design, develop, test, deploy, and support AI software components including foundation model training, large language model inference, similarity search, guardrails, model evaluation, experimentation, governance, and observability
* Invent and introduce state\-of\-the\-art LLM optimization techniques to improve the performance \- scalability, cost, latency, throughput \- of our aviation systems.
* Contribute to the technical vision and the long term roadmap of foundational AI systems
* Foster productive cross\-functional communication with our teams, actively proposing AI\-driven enhancements for novel product features
* Engage in in\-depth technical exploration of diverse machine learning solutions, technology stacks, and infrastructure to drive innovation and optimisation
* Develop monitoring, alerting, and diagnostics systems to ensure high\-quality product delivery.
* Ensure data privacy, security, and compliance by following industry best practices for access control and encryption.
* Effectively communicate insights and model outcomes to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders using visualization tools.


**Required**
**Knowledge, Skills \& Abilities\-**
* Strong expertise in Python, R, or other data science programming languages, with hands\-on AWS integration experience.
* Experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit\-learn on AWS.
* Proficiency in AWS data storage and compute services (e.g., S3, RDS, EMR).
* Deep understanding of AWS security, compliance, and data privacy best practices.


**Preferred**
* Experience deploying models using AWS SageMaker Pipelines or MLOps on AWS.
* Knowledge of AWS AI services (e.g., Comprehend, Rekognition, Translate).
* Familiarity with big data technologies on AWS (e.g., Elastic MapReduce, Glue, Athena).


**Education \& Experience\-**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field (PhD is a plus).
* 5\+ years of experience in data science, AI, or machine learning, with practical AWS infrastructure experience.


**Schedule \& Travel\-**
* Normal business hours are expected.
* Travel not anticipated.


**Miscellaneous\-**
* FLSA Status\- Full Time exempt
* Lifting requirements\- Up to 20lbs.

title: Senior Software Engineer at TrustMind
description:
Ever been frustrated by pointless security “requirements” that check a box somewhere but don’t actually improve security? We’re is on a mission to transform Third\-Party Risk Management (TPRM) into a source of real business value by using agents to bring depth and technical knowledge into the interface between software vendors and their customers. We're a small, dynamic, and fully
 **remote** 
 team of founders and engineers, working to build a groundbreaking SaaS solution. We're looking for a
 **Senior Software Engineer** 
 who is not just technically brilliant, but also deeply passionate about the product, user experience, and operational excellence.
 



  





 If you're excited by the challenge of leveraging cutting\-edge AI to solve complex problems and drive tangible user benefits, and are especially excited about getting to build greenfield without the burden of a bunch of legacy services to support, we want to hear from you.
 



  





**About the Role** 




  





 As a Senior AI Engineer at TrustMind, you'll be taking on a key role in shaping our product from concept to deployment. You won’t just be writing code, you’ll have a voice in defining
 **user flows** 
 , envisioning
 **how our users interact with our product** 
 , and of course, building and evolving with the latest cutting edge technology.
 



  





 We have an extremely flat structure so you'll work closely with and report directly to the founders, taking ownership of critical initiatives and helping to drive our technical direction. Given our fully remote and distributed nature, strong communication and self\-motivation are key. We operate with a culture where we
 **always assume the best in our communication with each other.** 




  





**What You'll Do** 




  





 ●
 **Design, develop, deploy, and manage** 
 our core agentic SaaS solution, ensuring scalability, reliability, and best\-in\-class performance.
 



 ●
 **Contribute significantly to product strategy** 
 , thinking beyond technical implementation to focus on user needs, business value, and operational efficiency.
 



 ●
 **Actively participate in the development of AI agents** 
 and sophisticated AI\-driven features.
 



 ●
 **Innovate with AI** 
 : Continuously explore and implement new tools, approaches, and technologies in the AI space to enhance our product and internal processes.
 



 ●
 **Collaborate closely with founders and the engineering team** 
 to define user flows, design intuitive interfaces, and iterate on product features based on feedback and analytical insights.
 



 ●
 **Tackle complex, multifaceted problems** 
 , applying a holistic view that considers technical feasibility, user impact, and operational realities.
 



 ●
 **Champion best practices** 
 in software engineering, MLOps, and system architecture within our growing team.
 



  





**What We're Looking For** 




  





 ●
 **Excellent communication skills** 
 and the ability to work effectively in a fully remote, distributed team environment where we assume best intent.
 



 ●
 **A senior\-level engineer** 
 with a proven track record of successfully shipping and managing complex SaaS solutions.
 



 ●
 **Deep understanding, practical experience and a high level of excitement for working with AI agents** 
 and LLM based technologies.
 **Product\-minded and user\-centric approach** 
 : You don't just build features; even more importantly, you understand
 *why* 
 they're being built and
 *who* 
 they're for.
 



 ●
 **Exceptional problem\-solving skills** 
 with the ability to see the big picture and anticipate operational challenges.
 



 ●
 **A strong ability to quickly pick up and master new tools, approaches, and technologies.** 
 We’re moving and evolving exceptionally quickly, not just in developing our product but in how we work. What’s possible changes daily and we’re constantly refining and looking for ways to improve.
 



 ●
 **Proficiency in Python** 
 for backend and AI system development, and
 **TypeScript** 
 for frontend development.
 



 ●
 **Strong experience with AWS** 
 for deploying and managing cloud\-native applications.
 



 ●
 **Self\-starter mentality** 
 : You're proactive, take initiative, manage your own workload
 



 efficiently and expect all your peers to do the same.
 



  





**Bonus Points If You Have** 









 ● Experience with
 **Langgraph** 
 or similar AI orchestration frameworks.
 



 ● Familiarity with knowledge graphs, semantic search, and other advanced NLP
 



 techniques.
 



 ● Experience with cybersecurity and vendor risk management concepts.
 



 ● Startup experience where you've worn multiple hats.
 



  





**Why Join TrustMind?** 




  





 ●
 **Impact:** 
 Be a foundational member of a fast moving team directly shaping our product and company. Your contributions will have a significant and immediate impact, delivering direct value daily rather than over the course of months.
 



 ●
 **Innovation:** 
 Work at the forefront of AI where we’re continuously learning, driving constant improvement to solve real\-world business problems in ways that weren’t possible even a year ago.
 



 ●
 **Flexibility:** 
 Enjoy the benefits of a fully
 **remote** 
 team with a focus on results, not rigid hours.
 



 ●
 **Growth:** 
 Opportunity to grow your skills, influence technical direction, and be a part of building something from the ground up.
 



 ●
 **Purpose:** 
 Help us make security theater a thing of the past by using AI to drive risk management decisions..
 



 ●
 **Culture:** 
 We’re a team of highly skilled SaaS veterans, excited about solving real world problems with new technology. We have a highly collaborative environment that supports each other and values empathy and clear, open communication to constantly improve..
 



  





 Ready to build the future? Apply now and tell us why you're the perfect fit for TrustMind!

title: AI Engineer II
description:
**Description**
**Job Title:** 
 AI Engineer II
   

  

**Job Location:** 
 Remote, Prefer the candidate is in Springfield, VA, Littleton, CO or Spring Lake, NC
   

  

**Job Type:** 
 Full time 40 hours
   

  

**Travel Requirement:** 
 Up to 25%
   

  

**Security Clearance:** 
 DOD Secret
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a talented and motivated Data Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in algorithm development, coding, data modeling, and data architecture, with a passion for applying innovative data science techniques to solve complex defense\-related problems. As a Data Scientist Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing data\-driven solutions, analyzing large datasets, and collaborating with cross\-functional teams to drive decision\-making and optimize processes.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Apply AI/ML modeling techniques in solving many types of problems
* Develop and design algorithmic solutions for automation projects
* Design, develop, and implement data science solutions to address defense\-related challenges
* Utilize advanced coding skills to manipulate, analyze, and visualize large and complex datasets
* Develop and deploy machine learning models and algorithms to extract insights and make predictions
* Experience with LLM toolkits: IE LangChain, LlamaIndex, AutoGen, CrewAI, Semantic Kernel, Model Context Protocol, Agent2Agent, and Pydantic AI
* Strong understanding of RAG pipelines, prompt engineering, and token optimization
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to identify data requirements, gather relevant data, and define project objectives
* Design and optimize data architecture and infrastructure to support efficient data storage, processing, and analysis
* Stay up\-to\-date with the latest trends and advancements in data science, machine learning, and defense technology
* Communicate findings and recommendations to technical and non\-technical stakeholders through clear and compelling presentations and reports


**Requirements**
**Qualifications:**
* Bachelor's degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field (Masters Degree preferred)
* Minimum of 3 years of experience
* Experience with many types of AI/ML modeling methods and algorithms for solving practical problems
* Expertise with DoD related domains, such as cybersecurity, intelligence analysis, or military operations
* Proven experience in coding (Python, R, Java, etc.) and software development, with a focus on data manipulation and analysis
* Strong background in machine learning, statistical modeling, and data visualization techniques
* Experience with data architecture, database design, and data warehousing concepts
* Excellent problem\-solving skills and the ability to thrive in a fast\-paced and dynamic environment
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in cross\-functional teams
* Self\-starter with the ability to work autonomously with just the right amount of guidance
* Must be a US citizen
* Must pass a background check and drug screening


**About Sherpa 6**
 At Sherpa 6 we love to solve problems and provide the best solutions for our customers. Our approach to a problem is to find a user\-focused and design\-driven solution that is simple yet functional and effective. We are a group of enthusiastic forward\-thinkers who are excited to build amazing solutions with bleeding\-edge technology. We hire people who are forward thinkers, passionate about what they do, love to collaborate and want to constantly learn. We enjoy what we do and we're not afraid to put the extra effort in to accomplish the mission; call us Sherpas. As a Service\-Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business, we know what it means to serve. We have made it our mission to be the leaders in solutions that protect and give our Warfighters the edge they need when put into harm's way.
   

  

**Background Screening/Check/Investigation**
 Successful completion of a background screening/check/investigation will/may be required as a condition of hire.
   

  

**Ada**
 Sherpa 6 will make reasonable accommodations in compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act 1990
   

  

**Eeo/Aa**
 Sherpa 6 does not discriminate based on race, color, national origin, sex, religion age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, height, weight, or marital status in employment or the provision of services and is an equal access/opportunity/affirmative action employer.
   

  

**Salary Range**
 The proposed salary range is reflective across all Sherpa 6 locations, years of experience and skill levels. Salary negotiations will be based on a host of factors including but not limited to your geographic location, prior experience, relevant skills, education, and certifications.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer a competitive benefits package, covering the cost of medical for you and your family; we also offer dental, vision, health and wellness benefits and a generous retirement savings plan. We believe that our employees can manage their workload and their personal life, therefore we extend a generous PTO policy. This allows our employees to balance their lives as they see fit.
   

  

 Salary Description
   

  

 $92,000 \- $152,000

title: Generative AI Engineer
description:
Founded in 2009, Zest AI has been pioneering innovative AI technology with a mission to expand credit access to create opportunities for more Americans to pursue their financial goals. Zest AI is transforming the
 
 $17 trillion US consumer credit market
 
 by delivering AI technology that helps lenders identify creditworthy borrowers overlooked by traditional methods, while leveling the playing field so financial institutions of all sizes can harness AI to provide better lending experiences.
 



  





 With over 50 issued and pending patents across automation, accuracy, performance, and model explainability, Zest AI is a leader in financial technology, providing financial institutions with AI tools that create a more resilient US financial system and a stronger U.S. economy. With over 600 active AI models, financial institutions rely on Zest AI's comprehensive suite of solutions spanning marketing, underwriting, fraud detection, lending intelligence, and more to make smarter lending decisions while improving profitability. This US\-based technology as a service company is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We’re seeking an AI Engineer (Gen AI) that shares the same passion in building enterprise\-level SaaS products that integrate with cutting edge AI technologies.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Become a key contributor to LuLu \- Zest AI’s GenAI SaaS product built for lending.
* Work within our GenAI team and build industry leading AI applications. Develop advanced GenAI features including data analytics and intelligent search.
* Lead Generative AI research initiatives to help us get on top of latest breakthroughs. Design and execute scientific experiments and evaluate results to help improve performance.
* Write and deploy production code in Python that supports client facing applications.
* Work closely with a cross\-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts, Software Engineers, Product managers to deliver high\-quality products..



  





**Qualifications** 



* A minimum of a Master’s degree in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, etc.) preferred
* Strong experience with modular/modern OOP software design using Python.
* Strong analytical skills and proficiency with using Pandas, Numpy, etc.
* Familiarity with source version control software, e.g., Git.
* Strong statistical and analytical knowledge to tackle complex and often under constrained data\-driven problems
* Knowledge and experience with GenAI applications (agentic framework, RAG, prompt engineering, etc.) is a strong plus but not required
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Established computer science fundamentals in data structures and algorithms
* Passionate about GenAI and how it can improve the world



  





**Perks and benefits:** 



* The opportunity to join a mission\-focused company
* People – the best part of Zest
* Robust medical, dental and vision insurance plans
* Annual bonus plan participation
* 401(k) with generous match
* Employee Awards and Recognition
* 11 company holidays
* Winter break (office closed between Christmas and New Year's Day)
* Unlimited vacation time
* Employee Resource Groups
* Generous family leave policy (12 week maternity leave / 6 week paternity leave)
* Phone, internet, wellness, and professional development allowances
* Employee gatherings, including Town Hall meetings



*Additionally, Zestys based locally and around our Burbank HQ enjoy:* 



* Beautiful, modern, dog\-friendly office with lounge areas, video games, and gigantic jigsaw puzzles
* Daily catered lunches from LA’s best restaurants and a fully stocked kitchen
* Complimentary manicures, pedicures, and mindfulness sessions
* Company happy hours, social events, outings, and much more!



  





**About Zest AI:** 




 Creating a diverse and inclusive culture where all are welcomed, valued, and empowered to achieve our full potential is important to who we are and where we’re headed in the future. We know that unique backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives help us think bigger, spark innovation, and succeed together. Zest is committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion and encourages professionals from underrepresented groups in technology and financial services to apply.
 



  





 Our core values are Communication, Collaboration, Bias for Action, Client\-centricity, and Heart. Learn more at Zest.ai, follow us on LinkedIn (linkedin.com/company/zest\-ai/) or Twitter @Zest\_AI, or check out our Insights blog (https://www.zest.ai/cms/insights

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
description:
As an AI Engineer specializing in AI Agents, you will play a pivotal role in our organization's transformation strategies by designing and developing domain\-specific AI agents and solutions. Prototyping, iterating, and taking these solutions to production, you serve as the technical complement to the business side of the AI Solutions Lead. Your work will involve close collaboration with transformation teams, business stakeholders, and AI platform teams to create scalable, cross\-domain AI solutions that deliver actionable insights and perform intelligent task.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 
 :
 



**AI Development (40%)** 



* Prototyping, iterating, and taking to production domain\-specific AI agents that can communicate and work with other AI agents, performing tasks such as information gathering, insight generation, and intelligent actions.
* Writing and optimizing code for high\-performance AI models.
* Develop an actionable Generative AI roadmap and drive solution development using Gen\-AI and Agentic AI capabilities.
* Collaborate with transformation teams and business stakeholders to understand requirements and tailor AI agents to specific domains.
* Work closely with AI platform teams to build scalable and cross\-domain AI agents while ensuring end\-to\-end observability.
* Lead AI projects, demonstrating hands\-on experience in code development and software engineering.
* Deploy, monitor, and optimize AI agents on cloud infrastructure, ensuring high availability and performance.
* Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies and integrate these into existing or new AI agents.
* Conduct thorough testing and validation to ensure the reliability and accuracy of AI agents and solutions.



  





**Responsibilities** 
 :
 


* **Education:** 
 Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, AI/ML, Data Science, or a related field.
* **Experience:** 
 Proven experience in leading AI projects with hands\-on experience in code development and software engineering.
* **Required Expertise:**
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C\+\+.
* Experience and working knowledge with Agentic AI frameworks (e.g., Langchain, CrewAi, MCP, A2A) and deployment of AI solutions on cloud infrastructures (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud).
* Strong understanding and experience in designing AI agents and integrating advancements in AI/ML technologies.
* Excellent analytical, problem\-solving, and communication skills.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a cross\-functional team environment.
* **Technical Proficiency:** 
 Deep understanding of new technologies, GenAI algorithms and Agentic tools.
* **Problem\-Solving:** 
 Ability to translate business challenges into technical solutions.
* **Collaboration Skills:** 
 Effective at working within cross\-functional teams.
* **Agility:** 
 Flexibility to adapt to changing requirements and new technologies.
* **Communication Skills:** 
 Capable of explaining complex technical concepts to non\-technical stakeholders.



  





**Compensation and Benefits:** 



* The expected compensation range for this position is between $106,400 \- $178,100\.
* Location, confirmed job\-related skills, experience, and education will be considered in setting actual starting salary. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range during the hiring process.
* Bonus based on performance and eligibility target payout is 12% of annual salary paid out annually.
* Paid time off subject to eligibility, including paid parental leave, vacation, sick, and bereavement.
* In addition to salary, PepsiCo offers a comprehensive benefits package to support our employees and their families, subject to elections and eligibility: Medical, Dental, Vision, Disability, Health, and Dependent Care Reimbursement Accounts, Employee Assistance Program (EAP), Insurance (Accident, Group Legal, Life), Defined Contribution Retirement Plan.



  





 Our Company will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Fair Credit Reporting Act, and all other applicable laws, including but not limited to, San Francisco Police Code Sections 4901\-4919, commonly referred to as the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance; and Chapter XVII, Article 9 of the Los Angeles Municipal Code, commonly referred to as the Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance.
 



  





 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability status.
 







 PepsiCo is an Equal Opportunity Employer: Female / Minority / Disability / Protected Veteran / Sexual Orientation / Gender Identity
 







 If you'd like more information about your EEO rights as an applicant under the law, please download the available EEO is the Law \& EEO is the Law Supplement documents. View PepsiCo EEO Policy.
 







 Please view our Pay Transparency Statement

 **AI Engineer** 
 to help shape the future of their Data Science \& AI initiatives.
 



  





 In this role, you’ll work directly with their Investment teams to design, build, and scale AI solutions that enhance decision\-making, optimize workflows, and drive measurable value across the firm. From prompt engineering and model tuning to production deployment and performance optimization, you’ll own end\-to\-end development of AI capabilities that matter.
